JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsible for developing software using cutting - edge    technologies . Familiar with security mechanisms    including web and web service security and their implementations. -  Perform design, coding and unit testing    activities for the assigned module(s) / feature (s) in the way that is    aligned to product and quality specifications.                                                                         Should have ASP.Net + MVC knowledge
